name: Crowned Heads - Juarez - Shots XX
additionalNotes: A medium-bodied smoke with an earthy, woody, chocolatey and nutty profile. Its Mexican San Andres maduro wrapper covers an Ecuadorian Sumatra binder and a Nicaraguan and Dominican filler. Handmade in Nicaragua, the Crowned Heads Juarez Shots LE 2021 is right sized for when you want a big, flavorful smoke, but short on time. This is a seasonal limited-edition stick, only 500 boxes of 50 cigars were made so be sure to order yours before theyâ€™re all gone.
